document_data.name: Ghiirvox
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghiirvox''' was the leader of the [[Scoured Legion]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Ghiirvox was very reserved and calculating for a [[tanarukk]]. He suspected rightly that the Grand Bloodreaver [[Jeervan]], a follower of [[Garagos]], would soon move to supplant him as warchief.
document_data.Description: Unusual for a tanarukk, Ghiirvox had violet-blue skin, suggesting a very particular [[demon]] among his ancestors.
document_data.History: Ghiirvox was a veteran of twelve conflicts in the [[Underdark]]. He ascended to his current position when his predecessor succumbed to [[Araumycos]]'s madness. In 1479 DR, his position was threatened by Garagos' worshipers, who were spreading in the Legion, and their leader Jeervan.
